languages.text: "Паскаль, ты последний, кого я бы хотел судить за хищение десятины. Только Вольный Торговец может забрать что-то отсюда ввиду своего статуса".

traits.locale_text: "Паскаль, ты последний, кого я бы хотел судить за хищение десятины. Только Вольный Торговец может забрать что-то отсюда ввиду своего статуса".

languages.text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, ты последний, кого я бы хотел судить за хищение десятины. Только Вольный Торговец может забрать что-то отсюда ввиду своего статуса".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."
"Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

"Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

languages.text: 「パスカル、お前を租税の窃盗犯として裁きたくない。唯一この惑星から何かを持ち出す権限を持っているのは、ローグトレーダーだけだ。{mf|彼|彼女}は特別な立場だからな」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、お前を租税の窃盗犯として裁きたくない。唯一この惑星から何かを持ち出す権限を持っているのは、ローグトレーダーだけだ。{mf|彼|彼女}は特別な立場だからな」

languages.text: "Pasqal, Ihr seid die letzte Person, der ich wegen Diebstahls des Zehnts den Prozess machen möchte. Nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat aufgrund {mf|seines|ihres} einzigartigen Status die Autorität, irgendetwas von diesem Planeten zu entfernen."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, Ihr seid die letzte Person, der ich wegen Diebstahls des Zehnts den Prozess machen möchte. Nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat aufgrund {mf|seines|ihres} einzigartigen Status die Autorität, irgendetwas von diesem Planeten zu entfernen."

languages.text: « Pasqal, vous êtes la dernière personne que je voudrais juger pour vol de la dîme. {mf|Seul le libre-marchand|Seule la libre-marchande}, du fait de son statut unique, a le droit de prendre quoi que ce soit sur cette planète. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, vous êtes la dernière personne que je voudrais juger pour vol de la dîme. {mf|Seul le libre-marchand|Seule la libre-marchande}, du fait de son statut unique, a le droit de prendre quoi que ce soit sur cette planète. »

languages.text: «Pasqal, es usted la última persona a la que querría juzgar por saquear el diezmo. Solamente {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, debido a su estatus único, posee la autoridad para sustraer bienes de este planeta».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, es usted la última persona a la que querría juzgar por saquear el diezmo. Solamente {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, debido a su estatus único, posee la autoridad para sustraer bienes de este planeta».

languages.text: “帕斯卡，在所有人里，唯独你我不想以盗取什一税的罪名进行审判。只有行商浪人本人拥有独一无二的资格，有权取走这颗行星上的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，在所有人里，唯独你我不想以盗取什一税的罪名进行审判。只有行商浪人本人拥有独一无二的资格，有权取走这颗行星上的东西。”

languages.text: "Aşarı çalmaya çalışacağını düşüneceğim son kişisin Pasqal. Yalnızca Hür Tacir, özel statüsü dolayısıyla bu gezegenden herhangi bir şey alma yetkisine sahiptir."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."

traits.locale_text: "Aşar çalmayı deneyeceğini düşüneceğim son kişisin Pasqal. Yalnızca Hür Tacir, özel statüsü dolayısıyla bu gezegenden herhangi bir şey alma yetkisine sahip."

languages.original_text: "Pasqal, you are the last person I would want to try for stealing the tithe. Only the Rogue Trader, due to {mf|his|her} unique status, has the authority to remove anything from this planet."
